title: Kostelooscoin
author: Kostelooscoin
content: Good evening everyone first of all I would like to know with ecctools, the maximum division is how much?I take an examplethere are 150 public keys so the maximum division will be 150

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Your question doesn't make sense - ecctools only has a modinv method, not a division method, and even that takes a single field element as an argument, nowhere close to 150.
